# Luhnomatic

Luhn number possibility list generator.

Example for the number 4458905717349939 with one then two missing numbers:

```
./luhnomatic.py '4458905*17349939'
4458905717349939
```

```
./luhnomatic.py '44589057**349939'
4458905709349939
4458905717349939
4458905725349939
4458905733349939
4458905741349939
4458905758349939
4458905766349939
4458905774349939
4458905782349939
4458905790349939
```

You can use any number of '*':

```
./luhnomatic.py '****'
0000
0018
0026
0034
0042
0059
0067
0075
0083
0091
0109
0117
[...]
9951
9969
9977
9985
9993
```
